mapper.select: select a.stock_time, a.warehouse_name, a.customer_name, a.temperature_type_name,a.rowExcelNo,a.rowExcelName from biz_pack_storage_temp a left join biz_pack_storage b on a.customerid = b.customerid and a.stock_time = b.stock_time and a.warehouse_code = b.warehouse_code and a.temperature_type_code = b.temperature_type_code where a.task_id=#{taskId} and b.del_flag=0 limit #{errorCount}
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_pack_storage_temp(task_id, cur_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, pallet_num, creator, create_time, is_calculated,del_flag, write_time, temperature_type_code, temperature_type_name, adjust_pallet_num, rowExcelNo, rowExcelName) values
( #{item.taskId}, #{item.stockTime}, #{item.warehouseCode}, #{item.warehouseName}, #{item.customerid}, #{item.customerName}, #{item.palletNum}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.isCalculated}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.writeTime}, #{item.temperatureTypeCode}, #{item.temperatureTypeName}, #{item.adjustPalletNum}, #{item.rowExcelNo}, #{item.rowExcelName} )
